sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import CommentList from './CommentList' import FormComment from './FormComment'; // Parameter: // comments: array object export default function Post({ _id, sender, content, creationTime, emoji, comments }) { const [user, setUser] = useState("") useEffect(() => { const user = (JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("userAuth"))).user setUser(user) // Show box image if exist image const boxImage = document.querySelector("#boxImage") (content.image) ? boxImage.style.display = "block" : boxImage.style.display = "none" }, []) return (
{/* LEFT */}

{sender.firstName + " " + sender.lastName}

{creationTime}

{/* RIGHT */}

{content.text}

{/* Emoji */}
Heart
Comment
Share
{/* Form Comment */} {/* Group Comment */}
) }
